description:
Tomo wants to experience some girly interaction, like hugging and hand-holding, so she tries it with all of her girl friends.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Egao no Riyuu / Joshippoku Tawamuretai / Hero wa Yoku Korobu
The Reason for Her Smile / I Want to Be Playful Like a Girl / Heroes Fall a Lot
笑顔の理由 / 女子っぽく戯れたい / ヒーローはよく転ぶ
